source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_00<tab>Alys is casting pained glances at one of her regulars.
target: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_00<tab>セブンスヘブンのアリスは、冒険者に話があるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_01<tab>Alys informs you that the wandering minstrel has been desperately awaiting your return to the Seventh Heaven. Share your tales of adventure with the forlorn bard, and supply him with the inspiration he needs to craft fresh verse.
target: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_01<tab>アリスから伝言を聞いた。異邦の詩人が、イシュガルドでの冒険について、話を聞きたいそうだ。セブンスヘブンの「異邦の詩人」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_02You regale the melancholy minstrel with the story of your exploits on Azys Lla. The bard's transformation upon hearing your tale is nothing short of miraculous, and he immediately takes up his harp. The stirring epic he composes to commemorate your triumph is flattering, but seems to suffer from some measure of embellishment...

※The Minstrel's Ballad: Thordan's Reign can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_SEQ_02異邦の詩人に、イシュガルドでの冒険を話して聞かせた。彼の詩の力で、ナイツ・オブ・ラウンドとの戦いを、もう一度体験できるようだ。あの長い旅路を思い返しながら、極まりしナイツ・オブ・ラウンドに戦いを挑もう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Yon bard has been gazing forlornly at the door for days, awaiting your return to the Seventh Heaven. Pray be so kind as to indulge the suffering fool, and favor him with one of your epic tales.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_000ようこそ、)) (( )) 03 /var>様。
イシュガルドでも勇名を馳せた貴方様宛に、
お言付けがございます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_001<tab>It seems his inspiration has run dry once more, and only a draft of your most excellent adventuring vintage will slake his creative thirst...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_001依頼主は「異邦の詩人」。
かの地で貴方様が辿った軌跡を知りたいとのこと……。
ご都合がよければ、そちらの方と語らってみてはいかがでしょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_002<tab>I'll serve you in a moment, but I'd appreciate it if you could first spare a story for our musical friend over there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_ALYS_000_002異邦の詩人が、貴方様の冒険譚を心待ちにしているようです。
ご都合がよければ、そちらの方と語らってみてはいかがでしょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, at last! In muted agony have I lingered, longing to hear the hero <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> speak of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> epic deeds in Ishgard and beyond.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010やあ、待っていたよ。
イシュガルドで君が成し遂げた偉業を、
ぜひ、本人の口から聞きたくてね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>The frozen tundra you braved, and into the vault of the heavens you ascended. To a sacred peak, both temple and tomb. To a ruined city, reborn and resettled. To a citadel of the ancients you ventured, parting the misty veil of millennia.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011六花吹き荒れる雪原、大空に広がる雲海、
人拒む峻厳なる霊峰、生まれ変わる廃都……
そして、遥かな時の彼方より蘇る魔大陸。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_012<tab>The journey made by you and your companions has made its mark upon the stars...and I would hear the tale in its entirety.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_012蒼天に刻まれた、君と仲間たちの旅路。
そのすべてを僕に聞かせてくれ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_013<tab>Your words have worked a miracle upon my melancholy heart! New verses arise unbidden, and threaten to spill from my lips... My harp! I must have my harp!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_013ああ、君の話は素晴らしいひらめきをくれた！
これは素晴らしい詩ができそうだ……。
さあ聴いてくれ、君の物語をね！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_014The song of war 'twixt wyrm and man♪
Some thousand years ago began,♪
When mortals grasped for godly might,♪
Defaming name of king and knight...♪
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_014『人と竜が紡ぐは　千年響く　戦の詩　
　これ断ち斬らんと　降臨せしは　円卓の騎神なり』

source:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_015...In Azys Lla, for woe or weal,♪
Did holy will meet righteous steel,♪
And thence was high divinity♪
Compelled by Light to bend the knee.♪
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_015『神と人が紡ぐは　魔境に響く　剣戟の音
　これ断ち斬るは　友の意思継ぎし　光の戦士なり』

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_016<tab>...What say you? Have I captured the spirit of your triumph?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_016……どうだろうか？
君の冒険譚を、聞いたとおりに詠ってみたんだが、
ちゃんと再現できていたかな？

source: TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_017<tab>Pray forgive any small liberties I may have taken with the details─one cannot evoke the proper picture of your glory without a certain measure of embellishment!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY301_02203_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_017すまないが、多少の脚色には目をつぶってほしい。
君という光を詩にするには、どうしても必要なことだからね。
